mapper.select: /* AdminDAO.selectUserVisitAll 방문자 수의 전체 정보를 조회 */ SELECT SEQ, ACCESS_TIME, OS, BROWSER, USER_AGENT, IS_BOT FROM USER_ACCESS_LOG ORDER BY ACCESS_TIME

/* AdminDAO.selectUserVisit 방문자 수의 전체 정보를 조회 */ SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ACCESS_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') as ACCESS_TIME, count(*) as VISIT_CNT FROM USER_ACCESS_LOG WHERE ACCESS_TIME BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{srchStDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{srchEndDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') + 1 AND IS_BOT != 'Y' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ACCESS_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY ACCESS_TIME
